long_description: This multi-tool comes complete with 19 tools for common road- and trail-side repairs, plus a light, durable case. Lightweight and easy to use, with a stainless-steel chainbreaker and 6050 steel tools. Features 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 8mm hex wrenches, two Philips and two flathead screwdrivers, chainbreaker and four sizes of spoke wrenches. Includes 8 and 10mm open wrenches and a Torx T25 for disc brakes.
short_description: This multi-tool comes complete with 19 tools for common road- and trail-side repairs, plus a light, durable case.
